testcase.classname: To check the functionality of home page to explore things
testcase.name: To validate that user is able to click on find store nearby to the customer's location and selects the product type from below dropdown list of SELECT PRODUCTS & SERVICES - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on HOMEPAGE...................................................passed When User clicks FIND ASIAN PAINTS STORE option and lands to STORE LOCATOR page.passed And User is able to enter the 453441........................................passed And User is able to click on button.........................................passed And User is able to select product from dropdown of SELECT PRODUCTS & SERVICES.passed Then User finds the shop near by the pincode entered area and is able to select product type.passed

testcase.classname: To check the functionality of home page to explore things
testcase.name: To validate that user is able to select filters of blog option and get the updated list of products
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page of Asian Paint...................................passed When User is able to hover on INSPIRATION...................................passed And Click on BLOGS option and lands to the page of blog option..............passed And User is able to select the filters by clicking on CATEGORY dropdown option.passed And User is able to view old prodcuts by selecting SORT BY option..........passed Then User gets the updated list of products.................................passed

testcase.classname: To check the functionality of home page to explore things
testcase.name: To validate that user is able to add review and give rating on the product
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage of Asian Paint site...............................passed When User hovers on the SHOP functionality and selects option PEEL & STICK WALLPAPERS.passed And User clicks on the product image and lands to the new page..............passed And User scrolls down the page and clicks on WRITE A REVIEW.................passed And User enters the mobile number and click on SUBMIT.......................passed And Enter otp and click on SUBMIT...........................................passed And User writes a review and clicks on SUBMIT button........................passed And User can give ratings to the product by clicking on stars option........passed Then User is able to add review and ratings on the product..................passed
